Class ProcessController

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.ProcessController
public class ProcessController extends Object
This class acts as a wrapper to control and execute the video creation processes.

      public ProcessController(org.apache.commons.exec.DefaultExecutor executor, @Nullable @Nullable OutputStream outstream, @Nullable @Nullable Path tempp)
      This class's constructor.
      Parameters:
      executor - The DefaultExecutor instance.
      outstream - An OutputStream instance.
      tempp - A temporary file on which the user has writing permissions.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public int execute(@NotNull @NotNull org.apache.commons.exec.CommandLine cmdline) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      This method executes the video creation processes.
      Parameters:
      cmdline - The given CommandLine instance representing the desired FFmpeg command
      Returns:
      1 if all processes complete successfully, otherwise 0
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs
      InterruptedException - If any Thread that guides the video creation process is interrupted.
